sentences.english: He was sitting there in striped pyjamas.
sentences.chinese: 他身著條紋睡衣褲坐在那兒。

sentences.english: He ran out of the house in his pajamas.
sentences.chinese: 他着睡衣褲，從房子裏飛奔了出來。

sentences.english: My brother was still in his pyjamas.
sentences.chinese: 我的兄弟還穿着睡衣褲。
這些是湯尼的睡衣褲嗎？

sentences.english: I think the best set of pajamas to wear better.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得最好還是穿一套的睡衣褲比較好。

sentences.english: N: DO you want clean pajamas?
But you just put on your pajamas and robe.
I'd wear it for you but, uh, I prefer pajamas.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得最好還是穿一套的睡衣褲比較好。

sentences.english: He bought a suit of pajamas.
